CustomField.formula: CASE(Category_1__c, "Manager",((( Subtotal_for_Part4__c /50 ) *100) *(35/100)), "HOD",((( Subtotal_for_Part4__c /50 ) *100) *(35/100)), "CEO",((( Subtotal_for_Part4__c /50 ) *100) *(35/100)), "GM",((( Subtotal_for_Part4__c /50 ) *100) *(35/100)), "Asst Manager",((( Subtotal_for_Part4__c /50 ) *100) *(35/100)), ((( Subtotal_for_Part4__c /50 ) *100) *(25/100)) )
